sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>A utility belt is a common item for those on active missions where quick access to tools and gear is a necessity; even Imperial stormtroopers use them. Their contents will vary with their user and their planned actions; sabotage missions might have belts with explosives and security slicer chips, while a ship mechanic might have his stuffed with his favorite tools. Some belts also have weapon holsters or clips.   Utility belts increase the character's encumbrance threshold by 1.  Models Include: Numerous Variants.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Utility Belt</name> <number>GEAR0001098</number> <price>25</price> <range/> <rarity>0</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 22:02:01</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e8b6887c2f94a450e0f497eef699b6b8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 22:02:01</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
